array_length_1d: WARNING! This function is deprecated as arrays are no longer limited to only 1 or 2 dimensions, and as such this function is only supplied for support of legacy projects. All new projects should use the current way of creating and accessing multi-dimension arrays (see here for more information).
With this function you can get the length (number of entries) of a 1D array. For 2D arrays you should be using the array_height_2d and array_length_2d functions.
IMPORTANT!: If the array has over 32,000 entries this function will return an erroneous value and should not be used.
